short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viewer for Microsoft Project files that allows you to view, read, and print Microsoft Project MPP files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Open, read, share or print any 2021, 2019, 2016, 2013 and 2010 .MPP file
formats.
• Supported Views: Gantt Chart, Calendar, Network Diagram, Resource
Usage, Task Usage
• Fully compatible with Microsoft Project
• Supports Sort, Filter, Zoom, Project Time Scales
• Integrated with MS Project Server, SharePoint, SkyDrive, Google Drive,
Dropbox, Box and Basecamp
• Print

Powered by Project Plan 365!
